summary: Adds a Wood Elf child in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
By popular demand, this mod adds an adoptable Wood Elf child in Solitude. Her name is Aratalath.

Her parents died from a disease and now she\'s waiting for someone to come and take her away from the loneliness off Solitude.

About the screenshot; she uses one of the vanilla wood elf eyes, but I\'m using a texture replacer, making them bright blue. I don\'t recall the name of that mod though.

Here\'s a texture replacer to remove the shimmer from the face and body that is present in the Drow mod. http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?pnoce1d0qpy4ww3

Required files:
Hearthfire
Drow Race http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16399/?

Recommended mods:
Child clothes for adult based children http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26952/

Known issues:
Aratalath might grow to adult size when using a cooking pot or sitting at a bench. But she\'ll shrink down to normal size when she stops using those items. It\'s a vanilla bug for children of a custom race.

Troubleshooting:
If she wont leave the place after you\'ve adopted her, you can target her in the console, type \"coc *house cell name*\"(example: whiterunbreezehome) and then type \"moveto player\".

Future plans:
Adding a male Bosmer child in Markarth. I need name suggestions though.
Also thinking of adding a version with ApachiiSkyHair too.

Thanks to:
Zazemel for the Drow (and child) race
tktk1 for their Khajiit child mod I used as a template to make this child.
author: T3alrose
